Package pieces

Class Board

java.lang.Object
pieces.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Board is a class which lays out the fields/methods for a chess board.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    Piece[][] board
    2D Array of Piece objects

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Board()
    Board constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Board buildCopy​(Board board)
    buildCopy creates a copy of the board passed in
    Piece[][] getBoard()
    getBoard returns the 2D Piece array
    Piece getPiece​(java.lang.String move)
    getPiece returns the piece on the board given the coordinates
    boolean inRange​(int rank, int file)
    inRange checks if a rank and file is in the range of the board's bounds
    void printBoard()
    Prints board
    void setUpBoard()
    setUpBoard puts all the chess pieces on the board in their respective places before the first player makes their move

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • board

      public Piece[][] board
      2D Array of Piece objects

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Board constructor

  • Method Details

    • inRange

      public boolean inRange​(int rank, int file)
      inRange checks if a rank and file is in the range of the board's bounds
      Parameters:
      rank - the row of the 2D array
      file - the column of the 2D array
      Returns:
      true if rank/file is in valid on board

    • getBoard

      public Piece[][] getBoard()
      getBoard returns the 2D Piece array
      Returns:
      Piece[][] array containing pieces

    • getPiece

      public Piece getPiece​(java.lang.String move)
      getPiece returns the piece on the board given the coordinates
      Parameters:
      move - the user-inputted coordinates of a square
      Returns:
      Piece object on the board

    • setUpBoard

      public void setUpBoard()
      setUpBoard puts all the chess pieces on the board in their respective places before the first player makes their move

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints board

    • buildCopy

      public static Board buildCopy​(Board board)
      buildCopy creates a copy of the board passed in
      Parameters:
      board - Board object where the game is being played on
      Returns:
      a Board object
